one_reviews_text: This is a great minimal viable product. Has all the most basic features of a voxel painting app. I'm looking forward to future versions of this app that gives more tools and environments. If anyone is looking for the premium experience - check out MakeBox.
It's funny and it's great if you want just a simple 3d painting tool to prototype something you have in mind

review_title: fun, useful and free voxel editor
one_reviews_text:
It does what it says, the user interface works, the color picker is good

why is there a litteral troll on each new document?
Although it isn't quite my style, the creativity is appreciated. My nieces LOVE this game, even more so than other apps I had to pay for. A great concept for free, everyone should at least try this.

This game is basically just a simpler version of oculus medium, but that is excellent if you are using the object models as objects in a game, like me.  Much simpler geometry, and less issue with torn meshes (hint to Medium)
It's just like Medium, but with blocks... Not sure why people likes blocks...

review_feedback:
Hi Sk2, 

It looks like Comodo has flagged Unity3D DLLs as false positives in the past. If you're still getting a warning message, you can submit your version of the DLL to Comodo for investigation:  https://www.comodo.com/home/internet-security/submit.php
